summary: This is an email exchange regarding staffing assignments for the Epstein case, indicating that one person will be assigned full-time and another part-time, with a request to delay contact from SDNY until the following week.
keyFacts: A person will be assigned full-time to the Epstein case until further notice.
Another person will be helping on a part-time basis.
The email requests that SDNY hold off on contacting these individuals until the following week to allow for briefing.
The correspondence is dated November 13-14, 2020, indicating ongoing case management at that time.
